import React from 'react'; import { motion } from 'framer-motion'; import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; import '../App.css'; // ‚ú® CAMBIO: Usar PNG para el header import CodeXRIconPNG from '../assets/logos/icon.png'; // ‚ú® NUEVO: Importar componente FAB import { FAB } from '../components/FAB'; function KeyFeatures() { const navigate = useNavigate(); const detailedFeatures = [ { id: 'interactive-visualization', title: 'Interactive Visualization', icon: 'üîç', color: '#ff6b6b', description: 'Explore your code in an immersive 3D environment where every metric comes alive with dynamic visualizations and intuitive navigation.', details: [ 'Real-time 3D rendering of code structure', 'Interactive navigation through code hierarchies', 'Dynamic visual feedback for code complexity', 'Customizable visualization themes', 'Mouse, keyboard, and VR controller support' ], benefits: [ 'Understand code architecture at a glance', 'Identify bottlenecks visually', 'Navigate large codebases efficiently' ] }, { id: 'realtime-metrics', title: 'Real-time Metrics', icon: 'üìä', color: '#4ecdc4', description: 'Instant analysis of complexity, code quality, and design patterns presented in a visual and comprehensible format.', details: [ 'Cyclomatic complexity analysis', 'Lines of code metrics', 'Function and class dependencies', 'Code quality indicators', 'Performance hotspot detection' ], benefits: [ 'Immediate feedback on code changes', 'Proactive code quality management', 'Data-driven refactoring decisions' ] }, { id: 'xr-experience', title: 'Complete XR Experience', icon: 'ü•Ω', color: '#45b7d1', description: 'Compatible with AR/VR devices for total immersion or on-screen visualization for maximum accessibility.', details: [ 'WebXR standard compatibility', 'VR headset support (Oculus, HTC Vive, etc.)', 'AR device integration', 'Desktop fallback mode', 'Cross-platform accessibility' ], benefits: [ 'Immersive code exploration', 'Enhanced spatial understanding', 'Collaborative XR sessions' ] }, { id: 'seamless-integration', title: 'Seamless Integration', icon: '‚ö°', color: '#96ceb4', description: 'Integrates directly into VS Code without additional configuration. Activate XR with a single click from your favorite editor.', details: [ 'One-click activation from VS Code', 'No additional setup required', 'Automatic file analysis', 'Context menu integration', 'Hotkey support' ], benefits: [ 'Zero configuration required', 'Fits existing workflow', 'Instant productivity boost' ] }, { id: 'smart-analysis', title: 'Smart Analysis', icon: 'üéØ', color: '#feca57', description: 'Advanced algorithms that identify patterns, suggest improvements, and highlight critical areas of your codebase.', details: [ 'AI-powered pattern recognition', 'Code smell detection', 'Refactoring suggestions', 'Dependency analysis', 'Security vulnerability highlighting' ], benefits: [ 'Automated code review insights', 'Proactive improvement suggestions', 'Enhanced code security' ] }, { id: 'enhanced-collaboration', title: 'Enhanced Collaboration', icon: 'üîÑ', color: '#ff9ff3', description: 'Share XR visualizations with your team for more effective code reviews and shared understanding.', details: [ 'Shareable XR sessions', 'Team visualization sharing', 'Collaborative code exploration', 'Export capabilities', 'Integration with review tools' ], benefits: [ 'Better team communication', 'More effective code reviews', 'Shared architectural understanding' ] } ]; return (
